audience.fullpath: Intended Audience :: by Industry or Sector :: Manufacturing

name: Windows Pocket
short_description:
Commonly mobile device with OS java can not run multiple apps at the same time (multi-tasking) Windows Pocket turn your mobile become a smartphone, Internet Browser, eBook Reader, File Manager, Google Maps etc. 
You can setting optional minimize key on setting menu 

NOTE : After it intsalled on your phone please application allowewd to read and write user data in java setting launcher. minimum required device MIDP 2.0 CLDC 1.1/1.0 JSR-75 free space heap/RAM memory 3MB.
Copyright 
Juna firmansyah
Jun Legend Software Inc.
http://www.facebook.com/jun.legend

summary: Windows Pocket a Multi-tasking Widget for java (j2me) enabled phone
